      • loadSection

        public PESection loadSection(java.lang.String name)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the section with the given name. If the file doesn't have a section by this name, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        name - the section's name
        Returns:
        PESection of the given name, null if section isn't contained in file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
